sentences.en: After all. Carlo is a native of Nevada, he knows his way around.
sentences.cn: 卡罗也是土生土长的内华达州人. 他在那一带路熟. ”

sentences.en: Any luck, these guys were amateurs, cashed your check in Nevada.
sentences.cn: 还好这些家伙是业余的, 他们在内华达使用了你的信用卡.

sentences.en: Before Sin City rose, this patch of Nevada was little more desert.
sentences.cn: 这座罪恶之称兴起之前,它所属的内华达州还基本是个沙漠(不毛之地).

sentences.en: But I think you and your son are all wrong with this Nevada business.
sentences.cn: 不过我认为你同你儿子在内华达州的问题上全打错了算盘.

sentences.en: If the driver does lose his job, he might consider a move to Nevada in the near future.
sentences.cn: 如果这个司机真的因此丢掉饭碗的话，他也许可以考虑在不久的将来搬到内华达。

sentences.en: If you did all that and come from a broken home in Nevada, so much the better.
sentences.cn: 如果你做到了以上所有这些并且来自内华达州的一个破裂家庭，那就更好了。

sentences.en: It is true that the top destinations for those leaving include Nevada, Texas and Washington, three states that have no personal income taxes.
sentences.cn: 那些离开的人的最终目的地包括内华达州、德克萨斯州和华盛顿州，这三个州是没有个人所得税的。

sentences.en: Much of Texas, New Mexico, Arizona, Nevada and Utah is desert.
sentences.cn: 新墨西哥州 、 阿里佐纳州 、 内华达州、犹他州和德克萨斯的大部分地区为沙漠.

sentences.en: Nevada had the highest share of its population homeless, about 0.68 percent.
sentences.cn: 无家可归人口占最高比例的是内华达州,无家可归人口占该州总人口0.68%.

sentences.en: Opponents of the legislation have sometimes called it the'screw Nevada " bill.
sentences.cn: 反对人士有时把这法案称为[螺丝钉内华达 ] 法案.

sentences.en: Starr had been a model and Miss Winnemucca, Nevada.
sentences.cn: 斯达曾经是个模特.内华达州的小姐.

sentences.en: The end of the Sierra Nevada cuts off all rain.
sentences.cn: 内华达山脉的尾部把雨水全挡住了.

sentences.en: The film begins with an aerial view of the Great Basin of Nevada.
sentences.cn: 影片以空中鸟瞰内华达大盆地的镜头开始。
内华达和加利福尼亚两州州界

sentences.en: The tall tale has here, one may think ( as in the Nevada atom bomb ), reached its ultimate.
sentences.cn: 荒诞不经的故事发展到这一步, 我们可以说 ( 正如内华达的原子弹 ) 已经达到它的极致了.

sentences.en: The tournaments will be held in the Northern Nevada area.
sentences.cn: 比赛将在北内华达区域被保持.

sentences.en: To her surprise, Kay came to love living in Nevada.
sentences.cn: 恺喜欢住在内华达州,连她自己也感到奇怪.

sentences.en: Yesterday his itinerancy included stops in Nevada and Montana.
sentences.cn: 昨天他出访的是内华达州和蒙大纳州.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 内华达山脉（位于美国加州）

trans.tran_cn: 内华达州(美国西部内陆州)
